document.full_text: in a booze marketplace lousy with gimmicks, provocateur, a nightclub, has contrived a fresh one: a menu of cocktails that purport to improve your skin.
document.title: the tipsy diaries: improve your skin by imbibing: radical or fadical?
lines_and_colors: in a booze marketplace lousy with gimmicks, provocateur, a nightclub, has contrived a fresh one: a menu of cocktails that purport to improve your skin.
